venue.name: Tavern in the Square - Central Square

item.description:
This is a joint meetup with Boston Tier 1 Riders.

This meetup (lunch) is an excuse to get out there and get some ideas for the summer and a chance to learn what the group would like to see happening this coming summer. There is also another reason for this meetup! Jackie is leaving us for 2 months and this will be a good chance to see her before she TAKES HER BIKE DOWN SOUTH so she can RIDE IT while our bikes are still... in the shed!
item.name: Introduction Meetup Joint Meetup w/Boston Tier 1 Riders
